remarks: Ordering relation for operators.  Definition of operator ordering in [Young] p. 141.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
leop2 $p |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ U e. HrmOp ) -> ( T <_op U <-> A. x e. ~H ( ( T ` x ) .ih x ) <_ ( ( U ` x ) .ih x ) ) ) $.
$d T x $.
$d U x $.
